get order flowers now for betty lu's visitation funeral service. jun 22. 11:30 am memorial park funeral home5668 poplar avenue. memphis, tn, us, 38119. get order flowers now for betty lu's funeral service interment. jun 22. 3:00 pm marked tree cemetery. marked tree, ar, usget order flowers now for betty lu's interment show less view & service share facebook twitter google+ post now light a candle virtual gifts yellow rose periwinkle blue green red dove angel heart hug butterfly roses hands in prayer bible sunshine teddy american flag veteran rosary gardener interlocked rings catholic cross football baseball golf sailboat firefighter non catholic cross basketball police buddha hockey coach soccer star of david canadian flag menorah memories events media share a memory of betty lu pope a friend sent flowers to the family of betty lu pope. to show you care same-day hand delivery by a local florist! sc susan featherston coatesjun 20 at 8:17 am i grew up in marked tree, arkansas and my families back yard backed up to the mc. gill's, so i've known betty lu all my life. she was such a fun, kind person. when my mom was in a nursing home in memphis during her final years, betty lu would visit her often and always brought her a little gift, candy or lotion, etc. she was so generous. my thoughts and sympathies go to cathy, clark, her brother robert, and other family members. susan featherston coates, monroe, la. comment share comment share facebook twitter
